page.title: 15FOOD AND EATING HABITS CONT.
page.content: Families with young children usually give the children their evening meal between 4-5 p.m. This consists of a quickly prepared dish like egg and chips, fish fingers, beefburgers and a vegetable followed by a sweet. Families with older children usually eat together later in the evening. Eating out at the local pub is popular at the weekends.Those people who drank alcohol in the evening usually went out to drink socially with others in a pub. Typical Daily Menu. BREAKFAST: tea or coffee, cereal, toast and marmalade. MID-MORNING DRINK: coffee. LUNCH: cheese or cooked meat sandwich. EVENING MEAL: Grilled pork chop, gravy boiled potatoes, peas, carrots, fruit pie or tinned sliced peaches and custard, tea coffee or soft drink.
